content:
New minor releases of VRDR-related artifacts are available. These releases add a new type of Canary test, allowing comparison between FHIR and IJE records, and better align Canary fields with the US standard death certificate. Complete release notes are available at the github links below. Please use these for developing targeting the STU1 VRDR FHIR IG.

Artifact Version Where to Find
Canary V3.0.1 github, docker
VRDRdotnet V3.1.1 github , nuget
Vital Records FHIR Messaging V3.1.0 github
